Welcome to the Fixed and Adaptive Clinical Trial Simulator (FACTS) Knowledge Hub!

FACTS is a powerful software tool that is trusted by half of the top 20 pharma companies to help them design efficient and successful clinical trials. 

We are proud that also numerous academic, government and regulatory institutions trust FACTS.
